insert into t_account_password (account_id, password_type, password, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passwordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_account_password set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password_type = #{passwordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where password_id = #{passwordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select password_id, account_id, password_type, password, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time from t_account_password where password_id = #{passwordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select password_id, account_id, password_type, password, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time from t_account_password
